UNCOMPLETED ROADMAP ITEMS for v0.5 (6):
  - Implement adapters/pytest_runner.py (PytestRunner implements TestRunnerPort)
  - Implement adapters/quality_checker.py (RuffPyrightChecker implements LinterPort)
  - Implement modules/verifier/core.py with granular reporting
  - Tests for verifier validating SPEC.md (behavior)
  - Wire verify_iteration into wiring.py with conformance test validating CONTRACT.md (interface)
  - All code passes full quality pipeline
agent_output_excerpt:
Iteration #14 complete. v0.5 — Verifier milestone achieved.

**What was built (7 new files, 1 modified):**

| File | Purpose |
|---|---|
| `adapters/pytest_runner.py` | `PytestRunner` implements `TestRunnerPort` — runs pytest via subprocess |
| `adapters/quality_checker.py` | `RuffPyrightChecker` implements `LinterPort` — runs ruff + pyright via subprocess |
| `modules/verifier/core.py` | Pure `verify(ProjectState, ProjectState) → VerificationReport` — no I/O, typed interface |
| `adapters/verifier_bridge.py` | Dict ↔ typed bridge for seed compatibility with `kernel/loop.py` |
| `modules/verifier/tests/test_verifier.py` | 18 unit tests covering protected files, quality gates, test gates, improvements |
| `tests/conformance/test_verifier.py` | 7 conformance tests proving equivalence with seed |
| `modules/verifier/SPEC.md` | Updated to reflect pure-function implementation |
| `wiring.py` | Rewired `verify_iteration` from seed → `adapters/verifier_bridge` |

**Key design decision:** The
